name: the seed packet blanket
notes:
this pattern is for a crocheted throw, measuring 48 inches square. it combines a variety of simple crochet techniques including granny squares, bobble stitch, granny stripes and a scallop shell border.

a lot of emphasis is placed on the unique colour combinations, which turn a simple pattern into something beautiful.

the 24 page pattern is packed with over 100 photo tutorials and very detailed instructions. 

plus there are ten accompanying video tutorials which walk you through the process.

this makes it suitable for anyone from beginners up.
